data.message: I still battle this horrible disease of addiction.  I am currently sitting in an ER IN Hbg PA.  I am partially paralyzed and want nothing more than to get away from the scene in my area I just dont have the capability ormeans to do so especially being paraplegic.  I'd love to come work for you after I beat this battle of mobility.  I chose life.  Not death......thanks em.  Keep it real bro
